title: International
content:
MacKenzie Scott has significantly reduced her Amazon stake, selling 58 million shares since last year, a reduction valued at $12.55 billion. This move comes after she received a 4% stake in the e-commerce giant during her 2019 divorce from Jeff Bezos. Scott has since donated over $19.25 billion to numerous non-profit organizations.

Foxconn Chairman Young Liu stated that China's new rare earth export controls are expected to have a limited short-term impact on the company. However, he warned that escalating tensions could affect industries globally. Liu also mentioned recent discussions with OpenAI CEO Sam Altman regarding future cooperation.
